definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
to rival sb for the affection of a man or woman/to be jealous of a rival in a love affair
lit. to add oil and vinegar/fig. adding details while telling a story (to make it more interesting)
(lit.) oil, salt, soy sauce and vinegar/(fig.) the trivia of everyday life
lit. firewood, rice, oil, salt, soy, vinegar, and tea/fig. life's daily necessities
pinyin: chai2 mi3 you2 yan2 jiang4 cu4 cha2

definition: vinegar jar/(fig.) person of a jealous nature
to add interest (to a story)/to sex up

sentences.english: Put the finely chopped shallots in a pan. Add the balsamic vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 把青葱细末放入锅里，加入香草醋。

sentences.english: Sugar and vinegar are seasonings of this sparerib soup.
sentences.chinese: 糖和醋是做这道排骨汤的辅料。

sentences.english: Vinegar is one of the best cleansers that I have used.
sentences.chinese: 醋是我用过的最好的一种清洁剂。

sentences.english: I like some vinegar when I having hot-pot .
sentences.chinese: 我在吃火锅的时候喜欢来一点醋。

sentences.english: If you eat a it raw, he suggested deeping dipping it in vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 如果要生吃的话，他建议用醋浸泡一下。

sentences.english: Fang's wife drank the poison with no hesitation. The poisoned turned out to be a cup of vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 房的老婆毫不犹豫地把毒酒喝了，其实那这是一杯醋。

sentences.english: The front housing is made of polycarbonate and the rear housing is made of reinforced unsaturated resins.
sentences.chinese: 前罩壳为聚炭酸醋，后罩壳为增强不饱和树酯。

sentences.english: Vinegar is not only a tasty flavor can be the first or the human body fitness high quality goods.
sentences.chinese: 醋不仅是调味之首可以入味，还是人体健身佳品。

sentences.english: I found a little caat sleeping in the boot of my car.
sentences.chinese: 我发现一只小猫在我的行李箱里醋睡。

sentences.english: Something will be changed , the egg will float in the cover of the liquid.
sentences.chinese: 而鸡蛋与醋发生了反应，浮在了瓶子的上半部。

sentences.english: Classic Buffalo-style chicken wing sauce is composed of 2 ingredients: a vinegar-based cayenne pepper hot sauce and butter.
sentences.chinese: 经典水牛炸翅的腌制酱料是混合醋和黄油的辣椒沙司。

sentences.english: Wait a few minutes, then rinse it out and wash as usual.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟后，漂洗掉醋，像往常一样冲洗头发就可以了。

sentences.english: Shaanxi food is also known for its liberal use of vinegar and garlic.
sentences.chinese: 陕西食品还因其可以自由使用醋和蒜而出名。

sentences.english: Drizzle with olive oil and champagne vinegar for a light and tasty dressing.
sentences.chinese: 少少淋上橄榄油和香槟醋和可口的敷料。

sentences.english: It also helps remove those odors that can be irritating.
sentences.chinese: 醋也帮助我们祛除那些烦人的臭味。
